features: [Patented Auto-Alignment Tech] Perfect installation within 60 seconds! The screen protector is embedded in a plastic frame that fits perfectly over your phone. Set the frame on your phone, swipe down the middle, and done! Watch our Installation Video to see how easy it is to use our Innovative OneTouch Auto-Alignment Screen Protector.
[Compatible with iPhone 13 Pro Max 6.7"] Specially designed ONLY for iPhone 13 Pro Max 2021 6.7 inch. Not compatible with any other iPhone models.

[2+2 Pack] 2* iPhone 13 Pro Max 6.7" Screen Protectors, 2* Camera Lens Protectors, 2* auto alignment tool kit (screen protectors come pre-installed in the auto alignment tool) and everything you need to install them!
[Screen Protection] 0.33mm thick premium tempered glass offers full coverage, scratch resistance, and drop protection for your iPhone 13 Pro Max screen 6.7'' and camera

[Anti-Fingerprint] amFilm tempered glass screen protector and camera lens protector for iPhone 13 Pro Max is finished with oleophobic coating to reduce fingerprints and provide ultra-clear high definition with 99.9% transparency.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So simple and perfect
reviews.reviewText: This is the best screen protector..so simple and easy to put on..no guess work..zero frustration on trying to get it on right and even. It was so simple and no bubbles. Everything you need to put this protector on. I just simply love this. It came with a camera protector also. You can’t beat the price and the quality is amazing!!! The ease of use to create a perfect flawless protection of your very expensive phone that we can’t live without.Please recycle the application tray. That is the only thing that sucks because that’s more plastic but if we all recycle it’s a win win…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent screen protector. It is a thin layer of glass and while I haven't thrown rocks at my iPhone's screen or dropped the device from the second floor to see how strong and effective it is from that perspective, but I can say it goes on really smoothly and without any hassle, it definitely reduces the glare, and it doesn't interfere with the touch screen functionality.The plastic sleeve that the screen protector comes in is a great tool to ensure that the screen protector goes on the device's screen precisely the first time and without messy multiple attempts to line up everything. It often feels like to install these screen protectors successfully, you need to be equipped with a clean room fit for computer chip manufacturing but this screen protection system manages to make it quite painless to attach your screen protection. The wet wipe, dry wipe, microfiber cloth, and particle remover sheet which come in the package do an outstanding job of ensuring that no particulate matter remains on the device's screen prior to mounting the screen protector. And as installation instructions explain, if there is a bubble after the installation, just lift up a corner of the newly installed screen protector until it lets out the bubble, re-press down the glass and you will end up with a pristine, clean, and clear screen. There are no annoying bubbles, particulate dark spots or streaks, or misalignment issues left to deal with. And now you have an extra layer of screen protection for your expensive device.The package also includes a lens protection shield for the phone's camera lenses which also goes on pretty easily and provides effective protection for the camera's lenses by covering them up with an extra layer of glass.All in all this item seems like a really useful protection for your $1,100+ phone at a pretty reasonable cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everything is great. I like the quality and feel.
reviews.reviewText: It’s a solid 10/10 to install, it goes on great and I managed to get it absolutely perfect on my second try. I would recommend doing it in a clean space with little dust like your bathroom with very little clothing on.The camera guard didn’t really like to go on quite perfect, no matter what you’re gonna have dust underneath and it will bubble at the corners but it still provides good protection and the camera lens is clear.My biggest complaint is that it just attracts dust like a magnet. Before screen protector, my phone if I rubbed it on my sleeve or pant leg it would come away spotless. Now when I rub it on a sleeve or pant leg it comes away covered in dust and hairs from my animals. Fingerprints stick to this glass like a magnet and the glass feels less… slick than an iPhone glass screen. I’m going to look into products I can spray on and wipe into this glass to get a slicker feel and get rid of that dust. I’m happy with the product though and I would buy it again. Maybe next time I’ll buy something of very high quality that is advertised for the slick feel of a real screen.EDIT: I’ve used this for a week or two now and I realized I was too critical of the coating. The glass is flexible and durable but when it shatters it will shatter into very tiny pieces of powdery crystal (I broke one of them intentionally to see). It appears I was wrong about how the coating attracts dirt and grit, it seems to perform very well now and maybe it was just the pants I happened to be wearing that day.The camera cover is either difficult to install correctly or just sucks. I’ve left mine on but it has bubbling at the edges still.Edit: six months later, both the screen protector and camera covering are cracked. I am brutal on my things and they cracked instead of my phone screen cracking so I’m pretty happy. I’d buy these again once I’m sick of the cracks on the originals. They took the damage so my phone didn’t have to

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to do
reviews.reviewText: Easy to do, quality is great. Will buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Install perfectly with the little frame tool. Stays put and works as a screen protector. It does crack if dropped but that’s what it’s supposed to do to protect your screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been struggling with screen protectors ever since there are screen protectors. In the past I found it easier to use one that came with a frame to help guide you in installing the protector. The frame helped, but I still had bubbles and unevenness. Until I tried this amFilm protector. The installation was seamless and very easy, and it looks perfect. I even had to check to make sure there really was a screen protector on my phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install with the provided applicator. No bubbles after 9 months of use now.
reviews.reviewText: Provided applicator made installation very easy. No bubbles have shown up after several months of use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I only use this brand for screen protection on all my devices
reviews.reviewText: I've used many brands of protectors and I love this one the most. It actually makes the phone easier to use than without a protector and my wife agrees so it isn't just me. They do not last forever, but I get about a year out of each one and this is the second pack I've purchased since buying my iPhone 13 Pro Max when it was new.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to install but not worthy
reviews.reviewText: I applied it to my phone without hassle. But the next day my phone fell on the carpet and i have a crack in the screen guard.The 100 rupee guard that we can get applied at the road side lasts longer and stronger.
